element-citation.article-title: Isolation and identification of flavon (ol)-O-glycosides in caraway ( Carum carvi L.), fennel ( Foeniculum vulgare Mill.), anise ( Pimpinella anisum L.), and coriander ( Coriandrum sativum L.), and of flavon-C-glycosides in anise. I. Phenolics of spices (author's transl)
